documents.document: First day back at work and I already wish I was at home and it's only been 3 hours ðŸ˜©
Kinda forgot about earthquakes after being away for a month. So that little one just then gave me such a fright!
@louiseberyllium Yea but we wanted to get stuff you can only get in Africa and it is sooooo much cheaper than australia
Can't take advantage of the super super cheap alcohol and perfume ðŸ˜­
Had so many issues in Johannesburg around buying duty free and other things simply because we have to transit through fucking Australia.
@louiseberyllium @shaymitch yep! ðŸ˜Š @Caspar_Lee @Joe_Sugg and @OliWhiteTV we're all here around new year too. But Cape Town is a huge place!
Bye Cape Town ðŸ˜¢
And on top of it already being really hot to sleep at night in South Africa, I now feel like parts of my body are on fire
Got sooooo sunburnt today. I haven't been this badly burnt in years.
Happy New Year New Zealand! We've still got about 12 hours to go here in South Africa but I'm having a drink for you all back home ðŸŽ‰
All I can say is Gus is a bloody legend and we all owe him a fuck load of beers when he gets to South Africa next week
HALLELUJAH WE'RE ALLOWED TO GO TO SOUTH AFRICA TONIGHT!
They said they can book us on tomorrow's flight but because my dad travels on an English passport he can't enter Australia without a visa
We've sent Gus out back home at 3am to go try get this copied document certified so that we can make it to our flight on time.
And it doesn't even matter that he's travelling with his family who all clearly have the same names on their passports. Dumb SA government
All because of some new law that says because my brother is under 18 he has to carry his birth certificate with him as well as his passport.
Currently stuck in Perth airport and might not be able to go to South Africa tonight.
Bye New Zealand! See you next year ðŸ™‹ðŸ‘‹âœˆï¸
Also only 1 week till I go to South Africa!!!!!!!
Last day at work and then I'm on holiday!!!!! ðŸŽ‰
Just accidentally punched myself in the face while trying to pull the duvet up hahahahahaha fuck
Just found out I finish at 4 instead of 5 and I'm stoked ðŸ‘ðŸ»ðŸ‘ðŸ»ðŸ‘ðŸ»
@louiseberyllium I saw zac on lambton quay so I must have just missed you
The only person I'm struggling with a wee bit is dad because he has his birthday 6 days before Christmas so I need extra gift ideas
I have ideas for everyone I want to buy for which literally never happens this early on in the year!
Feeling really organised with my Christmas shopping this year ðŸ˜ŠðŸ‘ðŸ»ðŸŽ„ðŸŽ
@sall_joey I considered going upstairs to go to the bathroom. That's how anti-people I'm feeling tonight haha
@sall_joey I needed to go pee for so long but didn't want to go out there. Eventually I just had to make a run for it quickly
@sall_joey oh my god I feel ya! I wanted an early night or at least a quiet night blobbed on the couch in front of the tv ðŸ‘ŽðŸ»
@louiseberyllium @sall_joey trains are still running from Porirua to Wellington
@sall_joey I thought it was just the roads north of Porirua?
I knew I should have called in sick today ðŸ˜‚ if this rain and flooding gets worse I could get stuck in Porirua
@erikaneal2 I had just fallen asleep and then the 7.5 woke us up just after midnight! Been feeling aftershocks all day since
@erikaneal2 most of NZ is pretty much on a fault line. The first big quake was centred down south but aftershocks are scattered all over NZ
@erikaneal2 yea everyone is fine. There was 2 deaths down in the South Island but none anywhere else. Was felt across the whole country!
@erikaneal2 we had a huge 7.5 magnitude earthquake in the middle of the night just after midnight. And loads of strong aftershocks today ðŸ˜°
Uncle Cam bought me a large coffee on the way to work this morning ðŸ‘ðŸ» he knew I'd probably need it
Is work cancelled tomorrow? coz I'd really appreciate that. Not gonna cope on very little sleep
@undograce same here! Had finally just fallen asleep too. Hope you're okay gal
I love how it's supposedly one of the safest places under the dining room table. But our table is a rickety piece of shit
Was sleeping naked but definitely not any more ðŸ˜‚I need to be wearing clothes if I have to jump out of bed again
That was the biggest earthquake I've ever felt. And now any time the house creeks or Jaden moves slightly I panic for a sec
@sall_joey mine wouldn't work on my phone but it worked on my laptop
@iHeartRadioNZ @broodsmusic @2degreesmobile @sall_joey this would be amazing!
@erikaneal2 do you know roughly what time the result is announced?
@undograce @adamcald11 this is honestly disgusting. I can't believe that this person filled with so much hate could potentially win.
Wishing I was at home to watch the All Blacks vs Ireland game but instead I'm at work ðŸ‘ŽðŸ» #NZLvIRE
@louiseberyllium is it open during the weekend? I really wanna come have a look
@louiseberyllium we were debating whether we'd need to get lollies or not but luckily didn't get any
Because it's the last day of the month this guy didn't need his monthly pass anymore so he gave it to me and told me to pass it on ðŸ˜ŠðŸŽ‰

Finally back in! Trying to get rid of the gross smell in the flat from the curry paste https://t.co/qVTPuOJ8xX
@louiseberyllium nearly txt ya before but then we finally heard back from chris who should hopefully be home soon
And my phone is slowly dying. It's on 13% guys
I've just sent Jaden to go get Maccas while I wait for Chris to get home
I realised as soon as we shut the front door that I'd fucked up. So now we've been locked out of the house for almost an hour
So decided to ditch the curry and go to the supermarket to get something else. But forgot my keys.
Started cooking dinner from this chicken laksa curry kit I wanted to try. It absolutely stunk and the sauce tasted gross
@louiseberyllium the gum around my wisdom teeth has been infected twice and the dentist said if it happens again I'll have to get mine out
